title: Till the formation of Parking Authority, a Committee under the Chairmanship of Municipal Commissioner, MCGM shall earmark/select the plots for public parking, on the basis of their suitability The Committee shall comprise the following or their representatives (i) Metropolitan Commissioner, MMRDA
clause_text: Till the formation of Parking Authority, a Committee under the Chairmanship of Municipal Commissioner, MCGM shall earmark/select the plots for public parking, on the basis of their suitability The Committee shall comprise the following or their representatives (i) Metropolitan Commissioner, MMRDA. (ii) Joint Commissioner of Police (Traffic), (iii) Dy. Director of Town Planning, Greater Mumbai (iv) Chief Engineer (Road), MCGM (Member Secretary).
section: 33(18) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lots (PPL):
